div.h2: Air Jordan 5 Retro Men's Black Red Basketball Shoe

div.a: Be the first to review this product

li.a: DESCRIPTION
li.div: Released in November 1997, participate into the "Last Dance" of the Bulls' dynasty. A legend goes to its end and a new play is approaching, the Air Jordan XIII was birth in the special time. Althought it did not show on the last 5.2 second of the 6th final of 1998, accompany with the last perfect shot, the Air Jordan XIII was still the witness of the important period. The Air Jordan Retro XIII basketball shoe is composed by EVA-backed full-grin quilted leather upper and Innovate hidden lacing system. Pylon midsole with heel and forefoot Zoom Air units was wrapped by the low-profile leather. The midfoot plate was made by carbon fiber. Solid rubber outsole with herringbone pods and Optimal Motion pattern.A nice hologram on the ankle is the most significance feature of the Air Jordan 29, which was said that inspired by a panther. The paw-like outsole is really turn people's head.
